model.description: number of requests issued at once vs average response time for requests

targets.rawSql: SELECT concurrent_requests, crawl_id FROM crawl_info WHERE domain_name = $Domains;
SELECT response_time, crawl_id FROM response_info WHERE crawl_id IN (SELECT crawl_id FROM crawl_info WHERE domain_name = $Domains);

model.title: $Domains

targets.rawSql: SELECT AVG(response_time) FROM response_info WHERE crawl_id = $Crawls;
SELECT COUNT(response_time) FROM response_info WHERE crawl_id = $Crawls;
SELECT total_requests FROM crawl_info WHERE crawl_id = $Crawls;
SELECT total_requests FROM crawl_info WHERE crawl_id = $Crawls
SELECT COUNT(request_id) FROM request_info WHERE crawl_id = $Crawls;

model.description: number of gigabytes downloaded in total for this crawl

targets.rawSql: SELECT bytes_downloaded FROM response_info WHERE crawl_id = $Crawls;

model.title: Gigabytes Downloaded

model.description: Number of requests that were blocked for this crawl

targets.rawSql: SELECT is_blocked FROM response_info WHERE crawl_id = $Crawls AND is_blocked = 1;

model.title: Blocked Requests

targets.rawSql: SELECT web_status_code FROM response_info WHERE crawl_id = $Crawls;

model.description: Download speed over time for this crawl

targets.rawSql: SELECT download_speed, time FROM response_info WHERE $__timeFilter(time) AND crawl_id = $Crawls;

model.title: Download Speed Over Time

description: Dashboard to view real time statistics on a crawling script

targets.rawSql: SELECT cost FROM crawl_info;

panels.description: total amount of gigabytes downloaded grouped by proxy

targets.rawSql: SELECT proxy, request_id FROM request_info;
SELECT request_id, bytes_downloaded FROM response_info;

panels.title: GigaBytes Downloaded Per Proxy

panels.description: Total CPU utilization over time for this cluster

targets.rawSql:
SELECT node_info.node_id, node_info.cpu_usage, node_info.time 
FROM node_info 
JOIN crawl_node ON node_info.node_id = crawl_node.node_id 
JOIN crawl_info ON crawl_node.crawl_id = crawl_info.crawl_id 
WHERE crawl_info.cluster_id = $Clusters AND $__timeFilter(node_info.time);

panels.title: CPU

targets.rawSql:
SELECT node_info.node_id, node_info.memory_usage, node_info.time 
FROM node_info 
JOIN crawl_node ON node_info.node_id = crawl_node.node_id 
JOIN crawl_info ON crawl_node.crawl_id = crawl_info.crawl_id 
WHERE crawl_info.cluster_id = $Clusters AND $__timeFilter(node_info.time);

SELECT node_info.node_id, node_info.diskspace_usage, node_info.time 
FROM node_info 
JOIN crawl_node ON node_info.node_id = crawl_node.node_id 
JOIN crawl_info ON crawl_node.crawl_id = crawl_info.crawl_id 
WHERE crawl_info.cluster_id = $Clusters AND $__timeFilter(node_info.time);

SELECT node_info.node_id, node_info.bandwidth_usage, node_info.time 
FROM node_info 
JOIN crawl_node ON node_info.node_id = crawl_node.node_id 
JOIN crawl_info ON crawl_node.crawl_id = crawl_info.crawl_id 
WHERE crawl_info.cluster_id = $Clusters AND $__timeFilter(node_info.time);
SELECT cost FROM crawl_info WHERE crawl_id = $Crawls;

panels.description: Requests per Second for this crawl

targets.rawSql: SELECT requests_per_sec FROM crawl_info WHERE crawl_id = $Crawls;

panels.title: Requests Per Second

panels.description: API status code for this crawl

targets.rawSql: SELECT api_status_code FROM crawl_info WHERE crawl_id = $Crawls;

panels.title: API Status Code

panels.description: Amount of requests sent at one time for this crawl

targets.rawSql: SELECT concurrent_requests FROM crawl_info WHERE crawl_id = $Crawls

panels.title: Concurrent Requests

panels.description: Count of all 4xx, 5xx, and isBlocked errors for this crawl

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(is_blocked) FROM response_info WHERE crawl_id = $Crawls AND is_blocked = 1;
SELECT COUNT(web_status_code) FROM response_info WHERE crawl_id = $Crawls AND web_status_code > 399;

panels.title: Error Rate

list.label: Domains
list.name: Domains

title: Crawling_Dashboard
